verses.kjv: I am the true vine, and my Father is the husbandman.
verses.ct: "I am the true vine, and my Father is the gardener.

verses.kjv: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away: and every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it, that it may bring forth more fruit.
verses.ct: He cuts off every branch connected to me that doesn't produce fruit, and he prunes every branch that does produce fruit so that it will yield even more.

verses.kjv: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.
verses.ct: You have already been pruned clean by the message I have spoken to you.

verses.kjv: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me.
verses.ct: Stay connected to me, and I will stay connected to you. A branch can't produce fruit on its own unless it remains attached to the vine. In the same way, you can't produce fruit unless you stay connected to me.

verses.kjv: I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.
verses.ct: I am the vine, and you are the branches. Whoever stays connected to me, and I to them, will produce an abundance of fruit — because apart from me you can accomplish nothing.

verses.kjv: If a man abide not in me, he is cast forth as a branch, and is withered; and men gather them, and cast them into the fire, and they are burned.
verses.ct: Anyone who doesn't stay connected to me is thrown aside like a severed branch and dries up. Such branches are collected, tossed into a fire, and burned.

verses.kjv: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.
verses.ct: If you stay connected to me and my words remain rooted in you, ask for whatever you want, and it will be given to you.

verses.kjv: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.
verses.ct: My Father receives glory when you produce an abundance of fruit, and this is how you demonstrate that you are my disciples.

verses.kjv: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love.
verses.ct: Just as the Father has loved me, I have loved you. Remain in my love.

verses.kjv: If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father’s commandments, and abide in his love.
verses.ct: If you follow my commands, you will remain in my love, just as I have followed my Father's commands and remain in his love.

verses.kjv: These things have I spoken unto you, that my joy might remain in you, and that your joy might be full.
verses.ct: I have told you all of this so that my joy will be in you, and so that your joy will be complete.

verses.kjv: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.
verses.ct: This is my command: love each other in the same way I have loved you.

verses.kjv: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
verses.ct: No one can show greater love than to give up their life for their friends.

verses.kjv: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.
verses.ct: You are my friends if you do what I command you.

verses.kjv: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
verses.ct: I no longer call you servants, because a servant doesn't understand what his master is doing. Instead, I have called you friends, because everything I have learned from my Father I have shared with you.

verses.kjv: Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain: that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name, he may give it you.
verses.ct: You didn't choose me — I chose you. I appointed you to go out and produce fruit, fruit that will last, so that whatever you ask the Father in my name, he will give it to you.

verses.kjv: These things I command you, that ye love one another.
verses.ct: What I am commanding you is this: love each other.

verses.kjv: If the world hate you, ye know that it hated me before it hated you.
verses.ct: If the world despises you, keep in mind that it despised me first.

verses.kjv: If ye were of the world, the world would love his own: but because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you.
verses.ct: If you belonged to the world, the world would embrace you as its own. But because you don't belong to the world — since I have pulled you out of it — the world despises you.

verses.kjv: Remember the word that I said unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord. If they have persecuted me, they will also persecute you; if they have kept my saying, they will keep yours also.
verses.ct: Remember what I told you: a servant is not above his master. If they persecuted me, they will persecute you too. If they followed my teaching, they will follow yours as well.

verses.kjv: But all these things will they do unto you for my name’s sake, because they know not him that sent me.
verses.ct: But they will do all of this to you because of me, since they don't know the one who sent me.

verses.kjv: If I had not come and spoken unto them, they had not had sin: but now they have no cloak for their sin.
verses.ct: If I hadn't come and spoken to them, they would not be guilty of sin. But now they have no excuse for their sin.

verses.kjv: He that hateth me hateth my Father also.
verses.ct: Whoever despises me also despises my Father.

verses.kjv: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did, they had not had sin: but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father.
verses.ct: If I hadn't performed works among them that no one else has ever done, they would not be guilty of sin. But now they have witnessed these works and still despised both me and my Father.

verses.kjv: But this cometh to pass, that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law, They hated me without a cause.
verses.ct: But this happened to fulfill what is written in their law: 'They despised me for no reason.'

verses.kjv: But when the Comforter is come, whom I will send unto you from the Father, even the Spirit of truth, which proceedeth from the Father, he shall testify of me:
verses.ct: When the Comforter comes — the Spirit of truth who comes from the Father, whom I will send to you from the Father — he will testify about me.

verses.kjv: And ye also shall bear witness, because ye have been with me from the beginning.
verses.ct: And you also will testify, because you have been with me from the very beginning."
